== Billy Aung Myint ==

Hello, I'm Billy aka wickedpuppy , who has been actively involved in Ubuntu and Team Ubuntu Singapore (TUSG) since it has founded in late 2006. <nowiki>[[http://who.is/whois/ubuntu.sg|Ubuntu.sg Whois]]</nowiki>

I am a member of TUSG as well as various Open Source groups in Singapore such as ,

* Singapore Ruby Brigade
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/OpenStackUserGroups#Singapore|OpenStack Singapore User Group]]</nowiki>
